price: Tunay na mayroon siya sa ganang Amin na talagang kadikitan at kagandahan ng babalikan.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
